description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission 22/02394/HOU (Erection of two storey side and rear wrap around extension. Erection of rail guard on front balcony, installation of 1no rear rooflight in existing loft. Alteration to fenestration). Amendment to consist of alterations to west elevation fenestrations, movable planters instead of integral planters on the rear extension flat roof, alterations to the material of the proposed rear windows, and new elevated planters at ground and lower ground floor instead of safety rails.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: In respect of condition 1 of application reference 22/02394/HOU,The following plans: A101-Ground Floor Plan Approved 21.10.2022A102-First Floor Plan Approved 21.10.2022A103-Second Floor Plan Approved 21.10.2022A104-Loft Plan Approved 21.10.2022A105-Roof Plan Approved 21.10.2022A106-East and North Elevations Approved 21.10.2022A107-South and West Elevations Approved 21.10.2022are replaced by:A101B revB - Existing and Proposed Ground Floor Plan Received 06.09.2023A102B revB - Existing and Proposed First Floor Plan Received 06.09.2023A103B revB - Existing and Proposed Second Floor Plan Received 06.09.2023A104B revB - Existing and Proposed Loft Plan Received 06.09.2023A105B revB - Existing and Proposed Roof Plan Received 06.09.2023A106B revB - Existing and Proposed East and North Elevations Received 06.09.2023A107B revB - Existing and Proposed South and West Elevations Received 06.09.2023Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
